Description:
Learn how the Microsoft Federal team is modernizing SAP ERP with RISE on Microsoft Cloud. This includes High SLA infrastructure on Azure Government, SAP BTP integration, and AI-powered monitoring. Discover how Defender and Sentinel secure workloads, and how sovereignty solutions support compliance. Gain practical lessons and insights from a real-world deployment for regulated industries.

To learn more, please check out these resources: \* https://aka.ms/ignite25-plans-MigrateSAPPlan ğ—¦ğ—½ğ—²ğ—®ğ—¸ğ—²ğ—¿ğ˜€: \* Barbara McElnea \* Veronika Reger \* Greg Simons ğ—¦ğ—²ğ˜€ğ˜€ğ—¶ğ—¼ğ—» ğ—œğ—»ğ—³ğ—¼ğ—¿ğ—ºğ—®ğ˜ğ—¶ğ—¼ğ—»: This is one of many sessions from the Microsoft Ignite 2025 event. BRK165 | English (US) | Migrate and modernize your estate, RISE with SAP Breakout | Intermediate (200) #MSIgnite, #Migrateandmodernizeyourestate

Chapters: 0:00 - Session Introduction and Welcome by Greg Simons 00:00:55 - Barbara McElmay introduces Microsoft SAP Systems and Agenda 00:12:05 - Overview of SAP Managed Tenant and Infrastructure Services 00:12:46 - Hosting on Azure Government and Role of NS2 00:27:49 - Deployment of Sentinel for Threat Detection and Defense 00:29:37 - High Availability and BCDR Co-Innovation with NS-2 00:35:14 - Lessons learned and cross-tenant authentication latency impact 00:37:30 - Migration strategy decisions: one-step vs two-step approach 00:43:04 - Closing remarks and Q&A session on technical integrations and security
